title: Link & Title Copy Pro - Copy Links as Markdown, HTML, & Custom Formats
description: The best Chrome extension to copy browser tab titles and URLs simultaneously. Export links as Markdown, HTML, Jira, or custom formats. Perfect for developers, researchers, and writers.
keywords: chrome extension, copy link, markdown copy, url cleaner, productivity tool, notion links, jira format, obsidian citations
ogTitle: Link & Title Copy Pro - The Ultimate Copy Tool
ogDescription: Copy smarter, paste faster. The ultimate browser extension for developers and researchers to clean URLs and format links instantly.
schemaDescription: A browser extension that allows you to copy both the title and URL link of a browser tab at the same time, with customizable templates and smart features.
schemaFeatures: Copy title & link, Custom templates, URL cleaning, i18n support

hero.subtitle: The ultimate browser extension for developers and researchers. Clean URLs, format markdown, and streamline your workflow in one click.

features.title: Packed with Power
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage links, without the clutter.

toast.title: Instant Visual Feedback
toast.desc: Never guess if you copied correctly. Our new Smart Toast shows you exactly what's in your clipboard, complete with a preview of the formatted link.

paste.title: Paste Anywhere
paste.desc: Intelligently adapts to your needs. Copy as Markdown for your notes, HTML for your blog, or clean URLs for sharing.

config.title: Powerful Configuration
config.desc: Take full control of your workflow. Customize shortcuts, manage templates, and toggle smart features with an intuitive interface.

templates.title: Custom Templates
templates.desc: Define your own formats using placeholders like {title}, {url}, and markdown syntax.

clean.title: Clean URLs
clean.desc: Say goodbye to 500-character tracking links. Automatically strip utm_source and other analytics garbage.

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts & i18n
shortcuts.desc: Bind your favorite templates to keyboard shortcuts. Fully localized in multiple languages.

developers.title: For Developers
developers.desc: Copy links for Git commit messages, Jira tickets, or generic Markdown documentation instantly.

writers.title: For Writers
writers.desc: Streamline your citations. Perfect for grabbing links for blog posts, formatted HTML, or newsletter curation.

research.title: For Research
research.desc: Integrates perfectly with Obsidian, Logseq, and Notion to build your second brain faster.

everyone.title: For Everyone
everyone.desc: Share clean links with friends without the ugly ?utm_... tracking parameters attached.

step1.title: Install Extension
step1.desc: Add to Chrome in seconds. No account required.

step2.title: Setup Templates
step2.desc: Configure your favorite formats like Markdown, Org-mode, or HTML.

step3.title: One-Click Copy
step3.desc: Click the icon or use a shortcut to grab the link instantly.

q1.a: Yes, Link & Title Copy Pro is open-source and 100% free forever. No hidden subscriptions.

q2.a: Absolutely not. We do not collect, store, or transmit any usage data. Everything happens locally on your browser. See our Privacy Policy.

q3.q: Can I create my own formats?
q3.a: Yes! You can create unlimited custom templates using placeholders like {title} and {url}.

footer.tagline: Open source productivity for the modern web.
